(“SBG” or “SoftBank”) today announced the termination of the previously announced transaction whereby NVIDIA would acquire Arm Limited (“Arm”) from SBG. The parties agreed to terminate the Agreement because of significant regulatory challenges preventing the consummation of the transaction, despite good faith efforts by the parties. title: Nvidia confirms it is investigating a cybersecurity incident
text: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia has confirmed that it's investigating a cyber incident that has reportedly downed the company's developer tools and email systems. Nvidia told TechCrunch in a statement that the nature and scope of the incident are still being evaluated, adding that the company's commercial activities have not been impacted as a result.
